revised_title: Chiral Invariant Lagrangian Theories of Hadron Dynamics: Explicit Representations
tldr: The authors study the algebraic properties of Lagrangian theories invariant under chiral symmetry, focusing on the tensors that characterize these theories. They provide explicit, closed-form expressions for these tensors and discuss their interrelationships, leading to new formulas and models for chiral invariant Lagrangian theories of hadron dynamics.
